name: Davidduc's Apartment Tran Vu 3
address: 182 Tran Vu, Tay Ho, Ba Dinh District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Davidduc's Apartment Tran Vu 3 offers accommodation in Hanoi, 400 metres from Tran Quoc Pagoda. The property boasts views of the lake and is 700 metres from Quan Thanh Temple. Free WiFi is provided .

A flat-screen TV is available. There is a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

West Lake is 800 metres from Davidduc's Apartment Tran Vu 3, while Dong Xuan Market is 1.3 km away. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 19 km from the property.
